caption.p: The breakdown of the barotropic vorticity budget (m/s) over 1992â€“2013 in the ECCOv4 State Estimate. From equation (3), Figure 1a is the planetary vorticity advection term, Figure 1b is the bottom pressure torque (BPT), Figure 1c is the wind and bottom stress curl, Figure 1d is the nonlinear torque, and the viscous torque is Figure 1e.
